org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async

类 AsyncLoggerContextSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.ClassLoaderContextSelector
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async.AsyncLoggerContextSelector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ContextSelector

    public class AsyncLoggerContextSelector
extends ClassLoaderContextSelector
    ContextSelector that manages AsyncLoggerContext instances.

    As of version 2.5, this class extends ClassLoaderContextSelector for better web app support.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.ClassLoaderContextSelector

    • 方法详细资料

      • isSelected

        public static boolean isSelected()
        Returns true if the user specified this selector as the Log4jContextSelector, to make all loggers asynchronous.
        返回:
        true if all loggers are asynchronous, false otherwise.
